SENT.plain: During treatment of a right internal carotid artery terminus aneurysm, an acute iatrogenic flow limiting dissection was caused in the cervical internal carotid
The true lumen was catheterized using a Mirage 0.008 microwire over an Excelsior SL-10 microcatheter, which was exchanged for a Marksman microcatheter
A 6 mm√ó30 mm Solitaire FR revascularization device was then deployed across the dissection as a salvage technique
